data.name: HUNDUN
data.detailed_description:
At a certain time in the future
Maybe far, far into the future
Maybe you and I don't exist anymore

As the ordinary world of us, what is the meaning of existence
It's a small thing, but you can still create something on your own

It may be small, but it still has some value
Yes, creating value is a very important meaning of survival
Or accomplish a great mission and save a planet!!

In the unknown planet, unusual changes have taken place, brave adventurer, are you ready to meet the challenge?

Introduction to gameplay

  • A first-person shooter game with great feel
  • 3D shooting, platform jumping, adventure puzzle solving
  • Challenge huge monsters
  • Enter the complex maze and find the shortcut to pass the level
  • Explore the world map, a huge conspiracy is waiting for you to discover

data.short_description: First-person shooter adventure game 3D shooting, platform jumping, adventure puzzle solving Have a great gun shooting experience

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx750ti
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1060
  • Storage: 128 GB available space
